content.text:
# Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Host for a Game Show

}}
The Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Host for a Game Show is an award that was first presented in 2023.
History
Before the creation of the category, game show hosts competed in Host for a Reality or Competition Program or the Daytime Emmy category of Outstanding Game Show Host.
